name: glenigan
description: Lead qualification pipeline for Glenigan construction data. Classify, extract Idox keyvals, enrich with web research, profile contacts, score leads, manage CRM.

commands.name: gleni-init
commands.description: Initialize Glenigan database and import PDF data

commands.name: gleni-loop
commands.description: Run the complete Glenigan pipeline loop

skills.name: gleni-ingest
skills.description: Ingest and process Glenigan PDF data

skills.name: gleni-dedup
skills.description: Deduplicate leads based on configured rules
